label: 唐果物
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [Also 唐菓物.] Wheat flour or non-glutinous rice flour that was moistened with a sweet liquid (amazura), and then kneaded into various shapes and fried in sesame oil (p. 536n). [甘葛]
